title: No gridlines in the table
content:
Dear Developer,

When writing a email, I copy and paste a table from microsoft excel app, and the table contains gridlines. Unfortunately, The gridlines are not displayed in Sender and Receiver sides. Why not display gridlines?
creator: andymachs

title: I am still not receiving Emails in or out. Asking for password but you said password was correct
content: Goodmorning. I am still not receiving Emails in or out. Asking for password but you said password was right to go. on 03/05/2025. thank you Pamela J. Receiving Emails through Email. Telstra.com ( Australia)
creator: pamela.james6

title: I can receive emails but can't delete them or forward them
content: Thunderbird is not working. My emails are accumulating and they won't delete. I can read them but action action them or delete them.
creator: dajoh

title: I have 3 pcs using McAfee VPN. I must turn off VPN to send from Thunderbird
content: Fix your problem. VPN works just fine using any of my other aps

title: Imap account
content: When I create an Imap account then close Thunderbird the Imap account disappears

title: configurazione pec su portatile
content:
Buongiono, ho un pc fisso ove ho Thunderbir che uso abitualmente anche per la pec. Ho istallato Thunderbird anche su portatile e, dopo la congiurazione, leggo e ricevo le pec ma nella posta archiviata vendo solo quella arrivata, non quella inviata. Da che potrebbe dipendere?

Grazie
creator: s.l.francesconapolitano

title: Gloda "Total" search gone awol - Rebuilt index dont solve the issue
content:
Here is an image explaining the issue I've been suffering from the last two days. Before everything was fine :-(

Any search gives me "strange" results. The worst is when there are at least 25 emails in the folders and no one is found, and the list is empty... ... or if it finds some while the others are lost in the void and you're not aware of that??

Already, I've Rebuilt the index twice... no satisfaction.

I need that feature to work perfectly, otherwise I'm lost !!!!!

( Local folder is populated by at least 25 root folders + a lot of subfolders with many sub-sub-folders )

PS: 2Â° pic "Agrip" should give a result > I was searching "agrip"'s mails not yet moved in that Sub-Sub-folder
creator: alainch2
